Hi Kris,

the recrawl stuff has finally moved to the top of my to-do list.
=
I have a distributed development and I'm good to go. :-)

I've looked at yo=
ur proposal and it looks good - my only 
query would be using a custom fron=
tier - I had envisaged separating 
the URL db into a separate service (part=
ly for selfish reasons - our
Smart Crawler will also maintain a list of all=
 URLS + policy metadata
outside of the crawler so by making it a service I =
would be able to kill
two birds with one stone).

Are you actively working =
on this stuff? if so would you like to divide 
the work into two and I'll g=
et stuck in as well or failing that would 
you like an alpha tester. Or if =
you aren't working on it would you be ok
if I went ahead and started buildi=
ng. 

cheers 

mark

n=E2=80=99t present yet but is becoming a priority so

ooking into doing continous repeating crawls that adapt
